title: Will my ineligible to earn loot affect seasonal rewards?
body: Got a 5 game chat restriction a while back, which I have played but I still have the "ineligible to earn loot" after each and every game, will this affect the seasonal rewards?  Thanks

replies.body:
Our 2016 Ranked Rewards Announcement mentions this:

>"This applies only to the 2016 season. Here are the details:
* Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
* Players issued a ban of seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (from August 7 on) are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
* Players banned for boosting during the 2016 season remain ineligible for rewards.
* Players who experienced fraud-related and erroneous bans will still be eligible."

Check out our [official announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon) for complete details on this year's rewards. Let me know if you have any other questions.

No. Your ability to earn hextech loot has no effect on your eligibility for end of season rewards. So long as you don't have an active chat restriction at the end of the season and you haven't had a ban that ended past August 7, then you will be eligible for the end of season rewards.
